channel.title: The Offical Server Its DragonzPkzScape V8
channel.description:
[center][b][i][u]Welcome To My DragonzPkzScape V8 Development Team Thread[/u][/i][/b] [u][b][i]A Huge Team To Be![/i][/b][/u]
[b][u]We Now Have The Latest Silabsoft Items Added Ooh Nice! - Latest Update[/u][/b]
[b][i][u]Server Base - PhoneScape - By Phone[/u][/i][/b]
Recuriting Status - Open
|-||||||||17% Complete
My Expectaions Want 2 Join? This Is What I Expect
Active Forum Member Active Server Player Good Coder Be Able To Do Quests And Shops ECT... Good Tester Be Able To Find Bugs,Glitches Forum Poster Server Player Good Hoster Must Be Able To Host Atleast 40 Players With No Lag Or Hardley Any Lag And BeAble To Host Atleast 4 Hours And 7 Days A Week Better Would Be 24/7
Application Is
[code]Name - Msn - Msn Only Forum User - Place Wanted - Experiance - Proof -[/code]
I Will Add You When U Apply
Forums - I Will Tell You On MSN As It Is Against Rules To Tell In A Post If You Get Declined Dont Give Up Try Again
Thread Rules 1. Dont Spam 2. Dont Go Off Topic 3. Dont Say Wrong Topic
Thanks Happy Appling
Good Luck
This Dev Team Is Serious!

item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

=( im so scared. You’re gonna ddos me? oooh no please be merciful. after you get past the two firewalls you have to deal with ubuntu. which everyone knows how easy UNIX is to crash right? PFFT. and dont make threats. you will get yourself into trouble little boy. and if you want to really understand the meanings. go to www.dictionary.com (sorry mods i didnt get the link cleared? >.<) and look them both up. Programming is something advanced users can do with java. coding is something the wanna be’s aka 95% of the “coding” population of these forums. NOW SHUT UP I HATE SPAMMING

i hate stupid people. Goodluck Pureman. Ignore the jealous wannabe’s.
